import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Description : ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
